channel.title: Question for those of you with Sony Vegas
channel.description: Alright, well I've been trying to use Sony Vegas for editing my videos, but the preview playback is awfully choppy, possibly 1 frame every 1 - 2 seconds. Does anybody else have this problem? And is there a fix for it aside from pre-rendering (shift+b)?

item.title: Question for those of you with Sony Vegas
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Yep, I made it this shittiest possible. Still choppy (albeit my computer IS kinda shit too, so meh).

Read full topic
item.source: Question for those of you with Sony Vegas

item.title: Question for those of you with Sony Vegas
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Have you tried turning down the preview quality?

Read full topic
item.source: Question for those of you with Sony Vegas
